title: Sqlmappy
extract: Description. This page has the objective to show an example SQLMap command to automate the auditing of a web application for SQL injection vulnerabilities. SQLMap is an open source penetration testing tool that automates the process of detecting and exploiting SQL injection flaws and taking over of database servers.Jan 21, 2016
